attributes.action: Let the RBS directores resign, do no be held to ransom by them,no-one is indispensable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time to call the bluff of these greedy Bankers. Without the investment of our money they would be out of a job in banking so let's help them on their way.
I am sure there are plenty of people just as capable of doing the job and maybe much more efficient.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
